snippet: To advertise the 3-D effects of "Jack the Giant Slayer," the studio is buying space on Travel Plaza TV, distributed in about 300 gas stations and Pilot Flying J truck stops in 42 states.
abstract: To advertise the 3-D effects of "Jack the Giant Slayer," the studio is buying space on Travel Plaza TV, distributed in about 300 gas stations and Pilot Flying J truck stops in 42 states.

headline.main: Warner to Show 3-D Film Trailers at Truck Stops
headline.print_headline: Warner’s 3-D Film Trailers To Be Shown at Truck Stops
